description:
An underground information broker that has a close friendship with Suzusaki Satoshi. She`s known as an expert in her field and is not someone that one should mess around with.
[spoiler="."]Many years prior to the events that take place she witnessed her boyfriend killed at the hands of several characters that are staying at the hotel. Afterwards she was assaulted and injected with an experimental drug that caused her to stop the aging process[/spoiler]
name: Shizui Mina
